unnormalised: Oh, I love reading athlete biographies! Especially when they cover folks from smaller towns. Imagine a kid from, say, Hubli, rising to international fame. It's truly inspiring! Remember "Chak De! India"? That kinda underdog spirit. I'd love to read about someone from IIT making it big in sports, or maybe a detailed look into PT Usha's training regimen. Real Rags to riches! Perhaps covering athletes in 100m, 200m and even 400m categories.
normalised: Oh, I love reading athlete biographies! Especially when they cover folks from smaller towns. Imagine a kid from, say, Hubli, rising to international fame. It is truly inspiring! Remember "Chak De! India"? That kind of underdog spirit. I would love to read about someone from I I T making it big in sports, or maybe a detailed look into P T Usha's training regimen. Real rags to riches! Perhaps covering athletes in one hundred meter, two hundred meter and even four hundred meter categories.
